Fireworks Mod.

4. Enjoy.
5. Make your own skyrockets.
6. Email them to me. This will improve the mod for everyone.



这是啥东西：
This mod adds a fireworks-launcher-block to the game. Trigger it by redstone or rightclicking. It will pick a random skyrocket from the folder mod/Fireworks/Skyrockets and launch it up in the air!
本mod增加了烟花发射器到游戏中，用红石激活或者直接右键发射，他会在mod/Fireworks/Skyrockets下的烟花形状中随机选择一个发射

Crafting recipe:


Installation:
 0. UNINSTALL PREVIOUS VERSIONS
 1. Get modloader and audiomod and install them.
 2. Delete the META-INF folder.
 3. Download the Fireworks-mod!
 4. Put all the files in this zip into  your minecraft.jar, except the Source folder and the readme.    
 5. Run minecraft!
 6. OPTIONAL: Change the BlockID (currently 110) by changing the number in .minecraft/mods/Fireworks/BlockID.txt
 7. OPTIONAL: if you have a slow computer, you may want to remove the skyrockets folder. All light skyrockets will be reinstalled. 


怎么做属于你自己的烟花:
 1. Run the game with the mod installed at least once.
 2. Go to .minecraft/mods/Fireworks/Skyrockets
 3. There you will see all the different types of skyrockets the mod currently has, like this (currently there are more files):
 
 4. Copy _Example.skyrocket, rename it and open it. They have the .skyrocket-extension, but just open them with notepad or any other .txt-editor.
 5. Here you see all the variables that can be changed. Every variable has #comments which tell you what happens and what a reasonable range is.
 6. Experiment!
 7. Save!
 8. OPTIONAL: remove the other files if you want your rocket to be the only rocket in game, usefull for testing.
 9. Run the game!
简单来说就是打开mod/Fireworks/Skyrockets，用记事本打开这些文件，里面自带说明如何编辑。看不懂鹰语的同学也可以自己随便改改。


Share them with the community!
Did you make an awesome skyrocket? Take a screenshot and email both the screenshot and the .skyrocket-file to me: <!-- e -->fireworksmod@gmail.com<!-- e -->
将你做好的超赞的烟花（和截图）发到以上这个邮箱和大家分享吧！

If I like them, I will add them to the frontpage of this thread or include them in the next update!
- I've included the Aquamarine Willow, by ClassiestMedic!
如果你喜欢，我会把这些漂亮的烟花包含进下个更新中哟


Problem Fixes: 
HELP! THE GAME CRASHES WHEN I LAUNCH IT AFTER CREATING MY OWN ROCKET!
 Sorry, I should have added proper mistake-detection. 
 You did something wrong, like giving red a value of "any_nonnumber_here"
 Fix it by deleting the Skyrockets folder (see step 2).
 Run the game, a new folder will be created.

Actually, for all your glitch/crash problems, just delete that folder. The mod will create a new folder.

THE GAME GIVES A BLACK SCREEN AND I'M SURE I DELETED THE META-INF FOLDER!  
 It probably uses the same BlockID as one of your other mods (110), you can change the BlockID in the txt file: .minecraft/mods/Fireworks/BlockID.txt. I suggest changing the value from 110 to 96 or something else.
